page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content: DUDLEY ARMS INN.THERE ARE FIVE PUBLIC ROOMS.THREE BARS AND TWO RESTAURANTS.THE MAIN FOOD IS BEEF STEAK, FISH, GAME, PASTA,COFFEE AND SWEETS.THE MOST POPULAR FOOD IS BEEF, STEAK.THEY CAN SEAT 180 PEOPLE FOR ANSUPPLIER IS SCOTTISH AND NEWCASTLR EVENING MEAL.THEY SELL THREE TYPES OF BEER,TWO LAGER AND GUINESS.THE MAIN SUPPLIER IS SCOTTISH AND NEWCASTLE BREWERIES.THE INN SELLS TEN BARRELS OF BEER EACH WEEK. THE VILLAGE HALL IS USED BY MOST VILLAGE GROUPS FOR MEETINGS,DANCES AND PARTIES. THE CRICKET TEAM HAS A FIELD HALF A MILE OUTSIDE THE VILLAGE.
